## IDisplayOptions interface

Options for positioning and styling an object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IDisplayOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [isHidden?](./bge-core.idisplayoptions.ishidden.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ If true, the identity of this object will only be displayed to the owner. If undefined, this value is inherited from the parent object. |
|  [label?](./bge-core.idisplayoptions.label.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ For objects that support it, this text will be displayed next to the object on the table. |
|  [localPosition?](./bge-core.idisplayoptions.localposition.md) |  | [Vector3](./bge-core.vector3.md) | _(Optional)_ Offset in centimeters, relative to the parent transform. |
|  [localRotation?](./bge-core.idisplayoptions.localrotation.md) |  | [Vector3](./bge-core.vector3.md) | _(Optional)_ Euler angles in degrees, relative to the parent rotation. |
|  [owner?](./bge-core.idisplayoptions.owner.md) |  | [Player](./bge-core.player.md) | _(Optional)_ Sets which player will always see the identity of this object, even if <code>isHidden</code> is true. If undefined, this value is inherited from the parent object. |
